title: Macross Frontier: Dakishimete, Ginga no Hate made.
original_name: マクロスフロンティア 抱きしめて、銀河の果てまで。
sinopse:
A super-spatiotemporal Cinderella versus a galactic fairy? Can the prince of destiny Alto accept their feelings? Macross Frontier with extra "moe" elements takes off!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
